description: This header file defines an abstract interface class IFactories within the WPEFramework plugin host namespace. It declares virtual methods for creating proxy objects related to web requests, responses, file bodies, and JSON-RPC messages, as well as static methods for managing a singleton instance and availability checks.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An abstract interface class that provides factory methods for creating web-related proxy objects.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy to a Web::Request object.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy to a Web::Response object.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy to a Web::FileBody object.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy to a Web::JSONBodyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message> object.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Sets the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the IFactories implementation is available.
